name: The Winners Circle
description: Turning punters into fanatics. The Winners Circle blends a fan rewards programme with fantasy horse racing. A joint venture between horse racing pioneers Racing League and blockchain technology provider (and L1 OG!) Zilliqa Group. The Winners Circle is powered by the $HRSE token. Fans purchasing $HRSE will gain access to new ways to experience racingâ€¦ Compete for rewards through the Racing League prediction game Exclusive experiences and opportunities to meet world renowned jockeys and racing influencers Votes on Racing League governance decisions that matter e.g. which horses your team should pick in the draft Opportunities to own discounted shares in racehorses
